subject: Dear  xxx ,
body:
Dear  xxx ,
Thanks for your email, kindly proceed with the below account and make
sure you complete the payment and send me the transfer confirmation copy
once it is done.
$585
Bank details:
Receiver : M. R.
IBAN: LT84 3250 0040 06xx xxxx
BIC: REVOLT21B
bank Name Revolt
Address: xxx 7655 Verdal Norway
Bank Address WESTFERRY CIRCUS, 7 THE COLUMBUS BUILDING FLOOR 4, LONDON.
Send me the bank transfer confirmation copy, it is very important.

subject: Re: Dear  xxx ,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you so much for your email. I'm really excited to proceed with this, but I have a few questions before we move forward. 

Firstly, could you please explain why the bank transfer copy is so important? I'm not very familiar with these processes and would appreciate some clarification.

Secondly, could you provide more details about what exactly the payment is for? It's always good to know what I'm getting into.

Lastly, are there any other steps or requirements that I should be aware of?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Karen

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:
Dear

Many thanks for the quick response. As you already know, you need to
contact the processing bank and request details about receiving your
payment. Also, note that you only have to pay the Notarization fee of $585
to complete the transfer process. Make no mistake, you can find the bank's
contact details below.

Contact the processing bank at the email below for quick and further action:
info.ubs@ubswiss.com
Bank: UBS Bank

Contact them now and make sure you get back to me for more directives to
follow, you need to be guided.


Sincerely yours,
Mr. Ben Swanson, Assistant Secretary-General
The United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services
United Nations Headquarters, New York City
Responsible for Internal Audits, Investigations, and Program Evaluation ,
